    public class MiamMiam
extends java.lang.Object
implements MiamMiamInterface
    The complementary class managing the only token of global network to allow only one cycle

    Remarque: Singleton instance
    Author:
    Florian FAGNIEZ, Brian GOHIER, No√©mie RULLIER
